KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Dictionary type 007
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: isText isSymbol isObject isString isType isStructure

Example.Description: This example shows how the type function return the user-defined data type of the AIS Objects evaluated.

Syntax.Expression: <sc> (setq X #{dic| Holiday1: "New Year's Day" Holiday2: "Memorial Day" } ) </sc>
